translation.title: Passing Away as Gods and Reborn as Gods

next.name: Dying as Gods and Reborn as Humans

previous.name: Passing Away as Humans and Reborn as Gods

segments.en: 108–110. Passing Away as Gods and Reborn as Gods

segments.pli: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye devā cutā devesu paccājāyanti; atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye devā cutā niraye paccājāyanti … pe … tiracchānayoniyā paccājāyanti … pe … pettivisaye paccājāyanti … pe ….
segments.en: “… the sentient beings who die as gods and are reborn as gods are few, while those who die as gods and are reborn in hell, or the animal realm, or the ghost realm are many.”

sections.title: “… the sentient beings who die as gods and…
